articles.author: Debashis Sarangi
articles.title: [Watch] Mitchell Starc Gives 'Death Stare' To Shahidi After Castling Him With A Lethal Yorker - OneCricket
articles.description: After blowing hot and cold, the veteran pacer bounced back in style, dismissing Afghan skipper Hashmatullah Shahidi with a searing yorker.
articles.content:
Mitchell Starc castled Hashmatullah Shahidi [X.com]
Ace Australian speedster Mitchell Starc had a forgettable start with the ball in the ongoing game against Afghanistan, as he was mostly wayward in… [+1146 chars]

articles.content: Arguably the most heated, yet underrated rivalry in modern cricket, between Sri Lanka and Bangladesh, reached a new level on Monday evening at the Arun Jaitley Stadium in New Delhi when veteran all-r… [+2010 chars]

articles.author: ICC
articles.title: Shakib Al Hasan ruled out of CWC23 due to a fracture - ICC Women's World Cup
articles.description: An injury to his left Index finger has ruled Bangladesh skipper Shakib Al Hasan out of the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup 2023.
articles.content:
An injury to his left Index finger has ruled Bangladesh skipper Shakib Al Hasan out of the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup 2023.
